net.minecraftforge.client.event

类 DrawBlockHighlightEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Event
      • net.minecraftforge.client.event.DrawBlockHighlightEvent
  • 直接已知子类:
    DrawBlockHighlightEvent.HighlightBlock, DrawBlockHighlightEvent.HighlightEntity

    public class DrawBlockHighlightEvent
extends Event
    An event called whenever the selection highlight around blocks is about to be rendered. Canceling this event stops the selection highlight from being rendered.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  DrawBlockHighlightEvent.HighlightBlock
      A variant of the DrawBlockHighlightEvent only called when a block is highlighted.
      static class  DrawBlockHighlightEvent.HighlightEntity
      A variant of the DrawBlockHighlightEvent only called when an entity is highlighted.
